title: Netru Illadha Maatram Lyrics Pudhiya Mugam
stanzas:
Netru Illadha Maatram Song Lyrics Pudhiya Mugam
#ARRahman #SujathaMohan #Vairamuthu

[ Netru illadha
maattram ennadhu.
kaattru en kadhile
thaan sonnadhu.

idhuthaan kadhal enbadhaa
ilamai pongi vittadhaa
idhayam sindhi vittadhaa
sol manamae  ] (2)

Kadavul illai endren
thaayai kaanum varai
kanavu illai endren
aasai thondrum varai

kavaidhai variyin suvai
artham puriyum varai
gangai neerin suvai
kadalil serum varai

Netru illadha
maattram ennadhu.
kaattru en kadhile
thaan sonnadhu.

idhuthaan kadhal enbadhaa
ilamai pongi vittadhaa
idhayam sindhi vittadhaa
sol manamae

vaasam illamalaee
vanna poo pookkalaam.
vaasam illaamale
kaattru vandhaadalaam

[ Netru illadha
maattram ennadhu.
kaattru en kadhile
thaan sonnadhu.

idhuthaan kadhal enbadhaa
ilamai pongi vittadhaa
idhayam sindhi vittadhaa
sol manamae  ] (2)
